title: Deployment - New Server Installation
description: As part of a project, a technician is deploying a new physical server in a client's server room.

tasks.description: Physically rack and cable the new server in the client's server rack.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server is securely installed and connected to power and network.

tasks.description: Configure the server's remote management (iLO/iDRAC) and BIOS settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server hardware is configured correctly.

tasks.description: Install the hypervisor (e.g., VMware ESXi) and configure it according to the project plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server operating system is installed and ready for use.
